title: 14 hydropower projects damaged due to flash floods in Himachal since July 25
description: At least 14 hydroelectric projects in Himachal Pradesh have been damaged due to flash floods since July 25, some multiple times over the past decade. Experts recommend disaster risk analyses, robust disaster management plans, and early warning systems to mitigate the impact on communities and power generation.
